title: Highest GDP per Capita
description: In 2023, Monaco boasted the highest GDP per capita in the world, reaching $256,580.52, showcasing its economic prosperity.

title: Most Protected Marine Areas
description: By 2024, Monaco had achieved 100% protection of its territorial waters, leading global efforts in marine conservation.

title: Most Effective Government
description: In 2023, Monaco's government effectiveness was ranked at the top globally, with a 100% percentile rank in the upper bound of the confidence interval.

title: Highest Water Productivity
description: Monaco achieved a water productivity of $1500.05 GDP per cubic meter of freshwater withdrawal in 2021, leading the world in efficient water use.

title: Highest School Enrollment Rates
description: In 2016, Monaco had a secondary school enrollment rate of 154.16%, the highest globally, reflecting its commitment to education.

title: Longest Life Expectancy
description: As of 2023, Monaco had one of the highest life expectancies globally, with females living up to 88.5 years on average.

title: Highest Population of Elderly
description: In 2023, 36.36% of Monaco's population was aged 65 and above, indicating a significant elderly demographic.

title: Highest Age Dependency Ratio
description: Monaco had an age dependency ratio of 72.04% in 2023, highlighting the economic pressure on its working-age population.

title: High Death Rate
description: In 2023, Monaco recorded a crude death rate of 20.97 per 1,000 people, one of the highest globally.

title: Smallest Land Area
description: Monaco has a total land area of just 2.084 square kilometers as of 2022, making it one of the smallest countries in the world.

title: Minimal Rural Land Area
description: In 2015, Monaco's rural land area was a mere 0.0349 square kilometers, highlighting its urban-centric landscape.

title: Low Capture Fisheries Production
description: Monaco's capture fisheries production was only 1 metric ton in 2022, indicating limited fishing activities.

title: Negligible Nonperforming Loans
description: In 2019, nonperforming loans constituted just 0.24% of total gross loans, reflecting a stable banking sector.

title: Limited Air Transport Activity
description: Monaco had only 3 registered carrier departures worldwide in 2019, showing minimal air transport operations.

title: Low Infant Mortality Rate
description: In 2023, Monaco recorded only 1 infant death, showcasing its effective healthcare system.

title: Minimal Under-Five Mortality
description: With just 1 under-five death in 2023, Monaco demonstrates excellent child healthcare services.

title: Low Neonatal Mortality Rate
description: Monaco reported only 1 neonatal death in 2023, highlighting its advanced neonatal care.

title: Low Adult Male Mortality Rate
description: In 2023, the adult male mortality rate was 31.218 per 1,000 male adults, indicating a healthy male population.

title: Balanced Female Population
description: As of 2023, 49.93% of Monaco's female population was aged 15-64, reflecting a balanced demographic structure.
